briefTitle: Rotigotine Versus Placebo, A Study To Evaluate The Efficacy In Advanced Stage Idiopathic Parkinson's Disease Patients
officialTitle: A Multicenter, Randomized, Double-blind, Parallel-group, Placebo-controlled Study of The Efficacy And Safety of Rotigotine Transdermal Patch In Chinese Subjects With Advanced-stage, Idiopathic Parkinson's Disease Who Are Not Well Controlled On Levodopa
summary: The primary objective of this study was to demonstrate that Rotigotine transdermal patch is efficacious in Chinese subjects with advanced-stage Idiopathic Parkinson's Disease as an adjuvant therapy.

primaryOutcome.measure: Absolute Change in Absolute Time Spent 'Off' From Baseline to the End of Double-blind Maintenance Period
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: From Baseline (Week 0) to end of Maintenance Period (up to Week 12)
